NPC.name: trolloc dha'vol
NPC.description: The trolloc is a twisted creature of evil, it is huge, standing nearly 10 feet tall. It is branded on left arm, the mark of the Dha'vol tribe burned into it's twisted flesh. It appears almost human otherwise, other than the hooves and rams head that is. It's all too human eyes burn with hatred upon spotting you, it picks it's teeth as it prepares to slaughter you.
NPC.longDescription: A trolloc of the Dha'vol tribe is here enjoying his meal.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistAlign AssistRace

NPC.name: myrddraal fade halfman eyeless lurk fetch shadowman
NPC.description: You see before you a myrddraal, a creature both of legend, and of great evil. They are known by many names, halfman, fade, the eyeless, lurk, fetch, and shadowman. It is the human part of the trolloc resurfaced, but still twisted by the Dark One's taint. It turns it's eyeless gaze upon you... this may be your last battle...
NPC.longDescription: A myrddraal emerges from the shadows to release your soul.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Thief Warrior Fade AssistAlign
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Sneak Hide DetectIllusion

NPC.name: trolloc ko'bal
NPC.description: The trolloc is a twisted creature of evil, it is huge, standing nearly 10 feet tall. It is branded on left arm, the mark of the Ko'bal tribe burned into it's twisted flesh. It appears almost human otherwise, other than it's wolf-like jowls that is. It's all too human eyes burn with hatred upon spotting you, it picks it's teeth as it prepares to slaughter you.
NPC.longDescription: A trolloc of the Ko'bal tribe is here enjoying his meal.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistAlign AssistRace

NPC.name: trolloc dhai'mon
NPC.description: The trolloc is a twisted creature of evil, it is huge, standing nearly 10 feet tall. It is branded on left arm, the mark of the Dhai'mon tribe burned into it's twisted flesh. It appears almost human otherwise, other than it's beak that is. It's all too human eyes burn with hatred upon spotting you, it pecks at the last of it's meal as it prepares to slaughter you.
NPC.longDescription: A trolloc of the Dhai'mon tribe is here enjoying his meal.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistAlign
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared Flying Swim DetectIllusion

NPC.name: flock raven ravens huge
NPC.description: A huge flock of ravens have gathered here. They are the Eyes of the Dark One. As soon as they spot you they descend, a huge black cloud come down to claim your flesh.
NPC.longDescription: A huge flock of ravens descend to destroy you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Thief

NPC.name: trolloc kno'mon
NPC.description: The trolloc is a twisted creature of evil, it is huge, standing nearly 10 feet tall. It is branded on left arm, the mark of the Kno'mon tribe burned into it's twisted flesh. It appears almost human otherwise, other than it's boar like snout and tusks that is. It's all too human eyes burn with hatred as it charges to attack.
NPC.longDescription: A trolloc of the Kno'mon charges from it's ambush!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistAlign AssistRace

NPC.name: creature oily
NPC.description: A grotesque black oily creature slides through the roiling black waters of the Lake. It seems quite hostile.
NPC.longDescription: A black oily creatures swims in the Lake.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior Fade AssistAlign

NPC.name: tree twisted
NPC.description: Much like the other trees of the blight, this tree is decayed, and black with disease. Unlike the other trees, this one seems a little more lively.
NPC.longDescription: One of the twisted trees shakes violently.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistAlign

NPC.name: draghkar
NPC.description: A tall pale humanoid, large wings folded, calls seductively to you, you feel drawn to the creature, at the last moment you pull away, and pull out your weapons.
NPC.longDescription: A draghkar emerges from a cave, and welcomes you to the Blight.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Mage Warrior AreaAttack Fade AssistAlign

NPC.name: disfigured diseased flesh lump creature
NPC.description: It's disgusting... hanging on to it's pain filled life with every ounce of energy. The taint of evil has twisted the creature beyond recognition, you fell the emense hatred this creature feels for you, it rambles closer...
NPC.longDescription: A diseased lump of disfigured flesh wanders the Blight in agony.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Changer AssistAlign

NPC.name: warder gaidan
NPC.description: You barely notice the graceful figure moving about the Blight. It is a warder. He does not look at you, but you are sure he sees your every move. You do not know the man, but you do know he is deadly, and from the looks of him, not to be trifled with.
NPC.longDescription: A warder stalks through the blight.
NPC.flags: NPC StayArea Warrior Changer Fade Rescue AssistAll AssistPlayers
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared ProtectionEvil Sneak Hide DarkVision DetectIllusion

NPC.name: lord
NPC.description: You see before you what is left of the Lord of the tower. He died many years ago due to the treachery that fell mighty Malkier. His spirit has stayed behind to protect what he can of the lost kingdom. You sense no great evil, or good, but a sense of purpose.
NPC.longDescription: The Lord of the tower forms beside the bed full of wrath!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Undead Warrior NoPurge Changer AreaAttack Fade
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil Haste DarkVision Swim DetectIllusion

NPC.name: lord
NPC.description: You see before you what is left of the Lord of the tower. He died many years ago due to the treachery that fell mighty Malkier. His spirit has stayed behind to protect what he can of the lost kingdom. You sense no great evil, or good, but a sense of purpose.
NPC.longDescription: The Lord of the tower forms beside the bed full of wrath!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Undead Warrior NoPurge Changer AreaAttack Fade
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil Haste DarkVision Swim DetectIllusion

NPC.name: spirit soldier
NPC.description: You gaze upon one of the dead defenders of Malkier. As it moves along the area immediately around it takes on new life. Objects faded with age take on new color, broken objects become whole, things return for an instant to the way they were, but then return to normal. The spirit could not save these things in life. It intends to try to do it in death.
NPC.longDescription: A spirit wanders in it's lost kingdom.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Undead Warrior Changer Fade AssistVnum
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared Sneak PassDoor DarkVision Slow DetectIllusion

NPC.name: spirit
NPC.description: You gaze upon one of the dead defenders of Malkier. As it moves along the area immediately around it takes on new life. Objects faded with age take on new color, broken objects become whole, things return for an instant to the way they were, but then return to normal. The spirit could not save these things in life. It intends to try to do it in death.
NPC.longDescription: A spirit wanders in it's lost kingdom.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Undead Warrior Changer Fade AssistVnum
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared ProtectionEvil Sneak PassDoor DarkVision Slow DetectIllusion

NPC.name: tree twisted
NPC.description: Much like the other trees of the blight, this tree is decayed, and black with disease. Unlike the other trees, this one seems a little more lively.
NPC.longDescription: One of the twisted trees shakes violently.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistAlign

NPC.name: tree twisted
NPC.description: Much like the other trees of the blight, this tree is decayed, and black with disease. Unlike the other trees, this one seems a little more lively.
NPC.longDescription: One of the twisted trees shakes violently.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistAlign

NPC.name: tree twisted
NPC.description: Much like the other trees of the blight, this tree is decayed, and black with disease. Unlike the other trees, this one seems a little more lively.
NPC.longDescription: One of the twisted trees shakes violently.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistAlign

NPC.name: seanchan sul'dam woman
NPC.description: This woman radiates a sense of fear, she seems as lost as you, but more than that she seems unwhole, as if a part of her is missing. The pannelled dress appears to be a military uniform almost, but she looks like no warrior you have ever seen.
NPC.longDescription: A woman in a plain dress, pannelled with lightning bolts stands before you.
NPC.flags: NPC StayArea Wimpy Warrior AssistVnum

NPC.name: metal metallic orb strange
NPC.description: You are amazed by this creature, it must be a highly armored beholder, or something stranger still perhaps. It hovers about 5 feet off the ground. You see no eyes on the creature, but feel it 'sees' you somehow. This did not come from any land you have ever heard of.
NPC.longDescription: A small metallic orb hovers above the ground here humming loudly.
NPC.flags: NPC StayArea Warrior AssistAll
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared Flying DarkVision Swim DetectIllusion

NPC.name: fox tall thin
NPC.description: This creature is very disconcerting, it reminds you of the scenes you have viewed above, the creature seems a little unnerved by his captivity, but looks as though he is making the best of things. Other than his sharp-toothed smile, and his attire appearing to be made of something like human flesh, he seems like a pretty nice guy.
NPC.longDescription: A fox-like humanoid grins at the scene around him and fingers his knives.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Thief AssistVnum
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared Sneak Haste DetectIllusion

NPC.name: grolm frog huge
NPC.description: A huge creature lumbers towards you, a wild grolm, frog-like, greyish, thick skinned nightmare. That is all you have time to think about until it is time to fight.
NPC.longDescription: A huge frog-like creature snarls.
NPC.flags: NPC Warrior
